# Discord Minecraft Bot

This project is a TypeScript Discord bot for managing Minecraft server information and game sessions.

## Features
- `/ip` command to display Minecraft server IP
- `/etat` command to show server status and player count
- Game session management for various mini-games

## Development Setup
- Node.js with TypeScript
- Discord.js for bot functionality
- minecraft-server-util for server status checking

## Configuration
- Discord bot token required in environment variables
- Minecraft server IP configuration needed
